about_the_game:
"Band of Brigands" is an exhilarating multiplayer RPG dungeon crawler where the race for riches takes a treacherous turn. In this game, players band together to delve into deep, dark dungeons, but the camaraderie is fleeting. Your goal is not just to battle the lurking monsters and decipher ancient riddles, but to outsmart your fellow brigands. Each player aims to snatch the most valuable loot and escape before their teammates. Trust is transient, and alliances shift as quickly as the shadows. Will you collaborate to overcome daunting challenges, or will you betray your band to grab the greatest treasures? Every foray into the dungeons promises new strategies, unexpected twists, and a relentless quest for glory and gold. Prepare to embark on a journey where only the cunning will emerge victorious!

Team up with friends or brave the dungeons solo in "Band of Brigands." Whether you're a party of one or a formidable group of four, the adventure scales to challenge every size of the band. Forge alliances with fellow players, strategize your moves, and delve into the depths together. Remember, while teamwork is key in navigating the treacherous dungeons, the ultimate goal is personal glory!

Embark on your quest as one of four unique classes: the sturdy Warrior, the mystical Mage, the charismatic Bard, or the stealthy Rogue. Each class boasts its own strengths, abilities, and playstyles. Customize your character to match your strategy, whether it's charging into battle, casting spells from afar, charming your way through obstacles, or sneaking in the shadows. Your choice will shape your journey and tactics in the ever-changing dungeons.

In "Band of Brigands," camaraderie and competition collide. Work alongside your teammates to overcome daunting challenges and gather treasures. But beware, the allure of gold can turn allies into rivals. Will you remain loyal and share the riches, or will you turn against your comrades for a greater share of the loot? The choice is yours, but every decision comes with consequences.

Every foray into the dungeons of "Band of Brigands" is a new experience. With randomized layouts, loot, and monster spawns, no two adventures are the same. This dynamic system ensures a fresh and unpredictable challenge each time you play, encouraging endless strategies and replayability. Prepare for the unexpected and adapt your tactics on the fly as you navigate these ever-changing labyrinths.

"Band of Brigands" features full cross-play support, allowing you to team up or compete with players across various platforms. Unite with friends or foes regardless of their device, ensuring you can always find a band to join or a rival to outsmart. This seamless integration broadens your pool of potential teammates and adversaries, making each game a unique encounter.

Take your dungeon crawling adventures on the move with "Band of Brigands" on Steam Deck. The game is fully optimized for Steam Deck, delivering a smooth, immersive experience whether you're at home or on the go. Enjoy the full depth of the game with the convenience and portability of the Steam Deck, ensuring your quest for glory never has to pause. Have any issues? Reach out to us on our discord and we'll be there to support you!
